title: Leaking Kitchen Faucet
description: The kitchen faucet has been leaking for the past 3 days. Water drips continuously even when fully closed.

title: Light Fixture Not Working
description: The light fixture in the living room stopped working. Tried replacing the bulb but still no light.

title: Heating Not Working
description: The heating system is not working. Temperature is dropping and it's getting very cold inside the apartment.

title: Refrigerator Making Loud Noise
description: The refrigerator has been making a very loud buzzing noise for the past week. It's especially loud at night.

title: Damaged Window Screen
description: The window screen in the bedroom has a large tear. Insects are getting inside the apartment.
